channel.title: Buying a full server client package
channel.description:
I will pay good money for a full RSC server/ client package. I want skills and quests as well as a working sprite, model and terrain editor. I also need help getting my custom GUI graphics and stuff added. I also want some help getting it all set up. I already have dedicated server hosting and can easily set up multi tier ddos protection. I mainly just want this as a personal project and if I release any clients it will be on invitation only.
PM me if anyone is interested.

item.title: Buying a full server client package

item.description:

invite me broi wanna pk with 1k times xp

item.source: Buying a full server client package

item.title: Buying a full server client package
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

You don’t need to pay money.
Use moparclassic source… get it from github.
Search for the landscape and sprite editor. Model editors are not publicly available.
Learn Java to do it yourself.
You don’t need ddos protection if its only for a few people.

Read full topic
item.source: Buying a full server client package
